basics.name: Anand Sharma
basics.summary: An enginnering student , passionate about building and designing machine learning systems that solve real-world problems

awards.title: Academic Excellence
awards.summary: Academic Excellence is awarded to students for thier outstanding academic performance

volunteer.summary: The National Service Scheme (NSS) is a voluntary public service program in India that provides students with opportunities to participate in community service activities. The program is run by the Government of India's Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports, and is implemented by the Department of Youth Services and Sports.
highlights: Organised various social welfare events as a organising team member

volunteer.summary: Contributed to showcasing the technology, product innovation to the delegates from G20 Digital Economy Working Group (DEWG)

Position of Responsiblity.summary: Was elected as the Media & Public Relations Secretary in the Students Union of IIT Hyderabad
highlights: Headed a team of around 30 students that worked for the PR and outreach of the Institute

Position of Responsiblity.summary: Teaching Assistant for the course Intro to Programming (ID1063)
highlights: Evaluated student assignments and provided constructive feedback to support their learning and skill development in programming.
Facilitated interactive learning experiences by addressing students' questions and concerns related to programming concepts and assignments.
Mentored and guided students in honing their problem-solving abilities and programming proficiency.

Position of Responsiblity.summary: Elan & nVision is the annual cultural and technical fest of IIT Hyderabad , I was coordinator of the Multimedia team responsible for the coverage of the event as well as creating media for outreach
Part of the Photography Club of IIT Hyderabad as Core Member

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
